programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep993
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Wolf Hiding
programme.desc: A cold-blooded killer, Chen An vows to take revenge for her sister who was killed by a crime gang. Dealing with the police and the triad at the same time, a final battle between good and evil has just begun!

programme.title: Beyond the Dream
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Lok is a recovering schizophrenic who falls in love with a young girl he first met. As he struggles to reveal his illness, Lok has a relapse and becomes delusional. Little does he know she is a mental health counsellor who has a hidden agenda. The pair develops a relationship that is beyond their wildest dreams.

programme.title: God of Gamblers 2
programme.desc: A new chapter of the highly successful "God of Gamblers". The legend's disciple Andy Lau is now rising in the gambling world as the "Knight of Gamblers"; clashing with another gambling icon, the wild psychic Stephen Chow (aka "Saint of Gamblers") who wants to follow the God. They mix like oil and water in a series of tricks and mishaps, but are forced to join hands against their master's nemesis on the gambling table.

programme.title: Fagara
programme.desc: After her fathers death, a Hong Kong girl discovers she has two hitherto unknown sisters, Branch and Cherry. Through taking up her late fathers hotpot restaurant, she reunites with her sisters by different mothers, and understands her father more from a different perspective, allowing her to finally resolve her long-time hard feelings with him.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon (2020)
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kongs legendary detective?

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Evas mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mothers wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Evas heart?

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: Echoes of the Rainbow
programme.desc: Set in Hong Kong in the 1960s, the story revolves around the family of a hardworking shoemaker Mr Law, with his happy-go-lucky wife and two sons a talented elder son and an eight-year-old eccentric younger son. While their lives are not always smooth-sailing, the family sticks together and support one another through thick and thin.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Gambler
programme.desc: Manfred and Flora are gambling addicts who have come across each other a few times at the casino, but do not leave impression on each other until they both suffer heavy losses and are held hostage by the loan sharks in Macau. They find themselves falling in love, and decide to get married when they come back to Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Italian Recipe
programme.desc: Famous pop idol Peng travels to Rome for a reality show and encounters an ordinary girl, Mang, who dreams of becoming a great chef after migrating to Italy. Peng and Mang have nothing in common but spend a magical night in Rome together. Their lives begin to change as the two start to fall in love.

programme.title: The Knight of Shadows: Between Yin and Yang
programme.desc: Pu Song Ling, a legendary demon hunter, is asked to investigate a case involving missing teenage village girls with disciple, Constable Yan Fei. The duo leads a group of little monsters to help with the investigation, and in their search for the truth, they accidentally discover a mysterious love between a knight and a female ghost.

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Xiao Rus financial analysis for a bank client was stolen online. A ransom has to be paid within three days or else the document would be disclosed. To protect the clients data, the company brings in the police to investigate. In the meantime, an analyst disappears and the Technical Director resigns. Is there a bigger crisis lurking behind?

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: Eternal Wave
programme.desc: Lin Xiang is a spy trying to rebuild an underground informant network in Shanghai after the Japanese Occupation. He meets a simple but righteous girl who acts as his wife in the secret mission. When Lin is captured after his identity was revealed, his wife comes to save him but can they escape from the foes?

programme.title: I Love You, You're Perfect, Now Change!
programme.desc: Catch this comedy-musical adapted from the Broadway classic I LOVE YOU, YOURE PERFECT, NOW CHANGE consisting of 12 independent stories from the viewpoints of individuals, families and societies all exploring the timeless theme of love!

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: Death Notice
programme.desc: A serial killer leaves death notices in a city, stating when, how and who he will murder. Even if the victims report it to the police and receive protection, the killer can still break through and execute them. While the police sets up a special task force in response, they expose an even bigger conspiracy behind.

programme.title: Marrying Mr Perfect
programme.desc: Winnie is dumped by her boyfriend in her late twenties and unknowingly meets Koo, a ruthless tycoon in business and a playboy. Koo temporarily switches identities with his driver for security reason and falls for Winnie as she is the first girl to love him for who he is. What will happen when Winnie know Koos real identity?

programme.title: The Invisible Guest
programme.desc: Young and beautiful entrepreneur Joanna is a prime suspect in a locked-room murder where her lover is found dead. She pays off a police officer to prove her innocence. During the investigation, they discover another murder case involving Joanna and her lover, and eventually reveals the truth.

programme.title: Flashover
programme.desc: This is based on a true story. A sudden earthquake hits the gas pipes in an industrial park, triggering massive explosions and engulfing the neighboring area in flames. When the Fire Rescue Force reaches the scene, firefighters must fight against the flames and time, as they commit to safeguard lives with their own.

programme.title: The Sunny Side of the Street
programme.desc: Hassan is a Pakistani refugee boy whose father has died in a car accident. A local taxi driver, Yat, then helps him flee Hong Kong. In the process, the two gradually develop a father-son relationship, until Hassan discovers the shocking truth about his fathers death

programme.title: High Voltage
programme.desc: A Hong Kong cop is assigned to escort an important witness from the Philippines, only to find himself teaming up with a local cop to bring down a wicked crime syndicate.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sects Zhang Chui Shans son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Dad, I'm Sorry
programme.desc: Ba Sang lives in a poor district in Saigon and his son Woan is a Youtuber earning considerable income. Woan wants his father to enjoy retirement, so he is mad at him for being a meddler and making unnecessary sacrifices. This has created conflicts between the two generations and leads to a crisis in the father and son relationship.

programme.title: Legendary Amazons
programme.desc: Produced by Jackie Chan, this is the story about the fabled Yang family of female generals in feudal China. Yang Zong Bao, the last man standing in the Yang family, dies in a battle when defending the Song Dynasty from invaders. Zong Baos wife Mu Gui Ying steps up to lead other widows of the Yangs into battle to continue their husbands legacy.

programme.title: Young Ip Man: Crisis Time
programme.desc: Set in 1917, young Ip Man pursues his studies in Hong Kong. The school is held hostage on the day of an English speech competition, and as Ip Man decides to step up and fight the crisis, it is revealed that his master and his childhood friend are behind all this. Can he take them down and uphold justice?

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: Chak, a small cleaning company owner, hits tough times during the pandemic. In need of an assistant, he hires a young single mother Candy, who unexpectedly helps him solve many difficulties at work. While life seems to get back on track, a series of cruel realities happen again, but they still bond together to support each other on the narrow road.

programme.title: Mr McDreamy
programme.desc: A second generation rich man squanders his parents money and calls himself Mr McDreamy. When his parents finally have enough and cut him off financially, he establishes a Mr McDreamy Training Academy using various unconventional means to transform his four recruits into Mr McDreamies with hilarious results.

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of The Way We Dance features the plight of Hong Kongs grassroots performing artists as they fight against the governments plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his peoples livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: The New Shaolin Boxers
programme.desc: Young carriage driver Kin offends the gangsters by saving a young girl. His boss immediately fires him to avoid getting into trouble. Since then, Kin is determined to protect the weak and learns the Tsai Li Fu style of martial arts from a Shaolin master to challenge the gangsters, finally beating them.

programme.title: The Cave of Silken Web
programme.desc: In this third instalment of Shaw Brothers Journey to the West, Monk Tang San Zang is trapped by seven seductive spiders, hell-bent on achieving immortality by eating him! Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing have to fight with the spiders to rescue Monk Tang San Zang.

programme.title: The Delightful Forest
programme.desc: The legendary hero Wu Sung is sent to a prison in Meng province after murdering his adulterous sister-in-law and her lover. While in prison, the officer Shih En spares Wu the humiliating baton punishment. Owing Shih a favour, Wu decides to help Shih get his restaurant back at all costs when it was forcefully taken over by a local thug.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demons clutches.

programme.title: The Champion
programme.desc: After years in prison, Lu Hu returns home to find himself set up by his ruthless brother Piao, who has taken over the family coal mine business and imprisoned their sister. Hu takes down Piao and saves his sister but their coal mine falls into the hands of a Japanese gang, which Hu and his sister must fight in order to get it back.

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: Shaolin Temple
programme.desc: As more people are learning martial arts from Shaolin, the Qing court orders for it to be banned and plans to destroy the temple. The Shaolin disciples decide to take their protest to the streets, using Shaolin skills to curb their hatred, but when the Qing troops start attacking Shaolin Temple, the disciples vow to protect it at all costs.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jins daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: The Black Falcon
programme.desc: Jenny Hu and veteran co-star Margaret Tu Chuan join longtime0020idol Paul Chang Chung in a battle against the notorious Black Falcon crime mob in Singapore. Together they have to face forgery, fire, and even poisoned needles to stop the mob.

programme.title: The Comedy of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sisters wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: Killers On Wheels
programme.desc: Kuo takes his family to an outlying island of Hong Kong for a vacation. On the ferry, they meet a group of young hooligans cum motorcyclists called the speed gang, led by Johnny, and Kuos sister Carrie is molested by Johnnys brother Michael. Kuos family continues to be harassed by the speed gang while on the island can Kuo protect them?

programme.title: The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: Li Xun Huan is a sentimental swordsman who has lived peacefully outside the martial arts world for the past 10 years. He returns home after knowing that the Plum Blossom Bandit is back to his old tricks, only to find that everything has changed.

programme.title: The Trail of the Broken Blade
programme.desc: Chivalrous swordsman Fung goes in search of another swordsman on the run, Li Yue, in order to reunite him with his love. Though both men meet and end up being close friends, Li Yue did not reveal his true identity until Fungs life is endangered by a gang looking for revenge...

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: Clans of Intrigue
programme.desc: Heroic outlaw Chu Liu Xiang is dining with his friend Monk Wu Hua, when Gong from the Holy Water Palace appears and accuses Chu of stealing the holy water from her Palace and using it for various murders. Chu denies, and is given a month to find the murderer or be killed by Gong. To prove his innocence, Chu decides to investigate the case

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insiders look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiangs popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: Mercenaries From Hong Kong
programme.desc: Filmmaker Wong Jing produced Mercenaries From Hong Kong, his very first modern-day adventure drama. In the dramatic plot he wrote, he sends superstars Ti Lung, Chen Hui-min, Wang Lung-wei, Lo Lieh and Wang Yu on a deadly mission. The film's action sequences are all closely guided by three great kung fu choreographers, led by Tang Chia!

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 3
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong go to Iron Palm Peak to search for the Book of Wumu. The chief of Iron Palm discovers their visit, and seriously injures Huang. It seems only the Southern Emperor Duan can heal her, but will Huang be healed in time?

programme.title: Diary of a Lady-killer
programme.desc: Tycoon Zhou is a playboy who is engaged to be married, but that did not keep him from working his charms on as many ladies as he can. He keeps a diary about his romantic escapades and soon, the women with whom he has been intimate with are being murdered one by one. Zhou becomes the number one suspect by the police but is the killer someone else?

programme.title: Men From The Monastery
programme.desc: At the end of the Ming Dynasty, Wu San Gui betrays his people to the Qing officials and recruits fighters from all backgrounds. Members from Wudan and Ermei are the first to yield and collude with local bullies. When they start attacking the Shaolin Monastery, its most famous disciples have to band together and fight against the enemies.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: Clan of Amazons
programme.desc: The martial arts world is plunged into terror when a mysterious figure known as the 'Embroidery Bandit' starts to attack convoys of precious materials. Seemingly unstoppable, the frightened clans decide to call on the expertise of Lu Xiao Feng, an inquisitive fighter and detective to capture the culprit.

programme.title: Hex after Hex
programme.desc: Hell may have no fury like a woman scorned, but hell literally, really has no wrath like a lusting ghost scorned! Cult classic director Kuei Chih-hung shoots the works with this amazing horror romance starring muscular "Venom" Lo Meng.

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: The Weird Man
programme.desc: During the Three Kingdoms period, a Taoist priest Yu Ji cures many patients with his supernatural powers and is loved by the people. However, the arrogant general Sun Che thinks that Yu Ji bewitches people and orders for him to be beheaded. Subsequently, the spirit of the Yu Ji rises from his dead body and takes revenge on Sun Che.

programme.title: Beyond the Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Huns warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: The Golden Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman supreme Cheng Pei-pei (Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon) teams up with director/writer/actor Lo Wei (director of Bruce Lee and Jackie Chans first major movies) for an evocative and terrific Martial arts world adventure consisting of a missing blade and a deadly sect of men-hating swordswomen.

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70s Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sisters magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre 2
programme.desc: Only by bringing together the powerful Heaven Sword and the mighty Dragon Sabre can six martial arts sects struggling for supremacy be saved in this thrilling sequel to Chu Yuan's original hit.

programme.title: Sunset
programme.desc: Teenage heart-throbs Ching Li and Paul Chin Pei come across like Annette Funicello and Frankie Avalon in the musical Sunset, a musical romp that plays similar to one of Hollywood's famous "Beach Party" movies. A car load of girls meets a car load of boys, and Ching and Paul ultimately fall in love. Yet the film takes an acrid twist and turns out to be more like a Shakespearian tragedy than a beach-babe party.

programme.title: The Blood Brothers
programme.desc: The friendship of three sworn brothers, Zhang, Huang and Ma ends when Ma gives in to corruption and falls for Huang's wife, eventually leading to a bloody ending.

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: Little Hero
programme.desc: An orphan, Little Bastard is taken on and trained as a fighter by a hermit. When Little Bastard grows up, he feels he is old enough to go out and look for his parents. Luckily for him, he befriends a beggar, Hsiao Yi, who being street-wise, manages to help him find his family, but somehow gets into trouble with the gang.

programme.title: The Mirror and the Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.desc: Tamil Thriller Romantic Movie, Starring, Udhayanidhi Stalin, Nivetha Pethuraj, Parthiepan, Soori, Mayilsamy,Rajendran & Others

programme.desc: An Andaman tribal who escapes from men trying to capture his people, ends up in the care of a spoilt, rich girl, who starts to fall in love with him. The Film features Jayam Ravi & Sayeesha in the lead roles

programme.desc: The Secret - Little Joe is arrested for murder when one of his closest friends, John Hardner tells of seeing him with Mary Parson, minutes before she is found dead.

programme.desc: Elizabeth, My Love - Ben helps his eldest son, Adam, through a crisis of re-living his years with his mother, Elizabeth. The story flashes back 30 years around 1840, from the time they first met to finally, her death.

programme.desc: The A.B.C. Murders (Part 2) - A is for Andover, the town where Mrs Ascher is found battered to death. B is for Bexhill, where Betty Barnard is strangled. C for Churston, the tiny Devonshire village where Sir Carmichael Clarke is murdered.

programme.title: Iceland with Alexander Armstrong S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Alexander witnesses a volcanic eruption, visits the original geyser, learns about the Icelandic belief in elves, takes a trip to an unusual museum and meets an Icelandic rock band.

programme.title: Japan with Sue Perkins S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sue Perkins starts her journey in Tokyo, home to 36 million people. She trains with a female sumo wrestling team and meets a family who live with robots.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep19
programme.desc: 50 million Big Hunks of peanutty nougat are produced every year; watch potato pellets become Smart Fries in just two minutes flat; and see how one million gummy bears are produced every hour.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep20
programme.desc: A mesmerising behind-the-scenes peek into the mega-industrial production lines of food factories, including pretzel nuggets, French fried onions and Italian Brio soda.

programme.title: The Mating Game S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Grasslands: In Plain Sight - The strategies used by animals to find and defend their mates in the grasslands of Namibia, the Serengeti and Australia. Here, mating strategies are on show for all to see.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S10 Ep8
programme.desc: Columbia - In Dorset, Ben spends a week with Chris, a former paratrooper who has spent the last five years walking the UK's coastline, finding love and raising thousands for charity.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep21
programme.desc: A mesmerising behind-the-scenes peek into food factories. Today we see the production of hot sauce, lemon Italian ice and packed peanuts.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep22
programme.desc: A look at the production of food in the our food factories. This episode looks at the factories producing mustard, wafer biscuits, teriyaki sauce and coconut macaroons.

programme.title: Earth from Space S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Changing Planet - Cameras in space capture natural spectacles on an epic scale.

programme.title: Australia with Simon Reeve S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Simon discovers why millions of tourists flock to the Gold Coast - which has now become the crime capital of Australia.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S4 Ep3
programme.desc: Impalers - Cyril aims to catch a fish that can weigh more than a thousand pounds, and is known to be so strong that fishermen have been impaled by its bill.

programme.title: Coastal Fishing with Robson Green S1 Ep1
programme.desc: South West of England - Robson travels around the South West of England as he seeks the Conger Eel.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Connections Ep2
programme.desc: Follow scientists and Traditional Owners as they map out ecological links, migratory pathways, and interspecies bonds that conserve Ningaloos biodiversity. Frolic with whales, float among seaweed islands, and see archaeologists nix a settler myth.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Choices Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how Ningaloos conservation miracle could inspire humans to pull the planet back from the brink of climatic destruction. Visit an abandoned whaling station and other ruins that show we have the tools, if only we can find the will to change.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Waterhole Ep1
programme.desc: Witness clashes over precious resources when the dry season brings a band of gladiators to an African savannah watering hole. See a lion-elephant territory brawl, an ant raid on a termite mound, and a honey badgers risky dance with a deadly snake.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Wild Coast Ep2
programme.desc: Go up against Australias wiliest gladiators and their impressive arsenals. Learn if these weapons, such as the kangaroos deadly boxing moves and the redback spiders precision-engineered traps, can help them survive the ravages of climate change.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Jungle River Ep3
programme.desc: Cheer as young gladiators earn their stripes in the dense tropical forests of the Americas. Stand back as a poison dart frog launches a toxic barrage, observe a jaguar-caiman turf war, and see a hungry coati cross paths with a defensive tarantula.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Social Ep3
programme.desc: Meet alphas who get by with a little help from their friends. Discover the inescapable gang mentality of mating male dolphins, ponder ant colonies unique scents, find out why female geladas always get the last word, and see wolves hunt family-style.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Tidelands Ep4
programme.desc: Head to Americas far north for a peek at the ultimate fighters that live along its waterways. See a spring thaw kick off the competition, pitting eagles against herons, bears against bears, and dragonfly nymphs against venomous giant water bugs.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Collisions Ep1
programme.desc: Observe the natural and human forces that have shaped Ningaloo Reef, Cape Range, and Exmouth Gulf with Tim, Traditional Owners, and other experts. Check out a million-year-old fossil reef, a gargantuan fish, and a ray that packs quite a punch.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Connections Ep2
programme.desc: Follow scientists and Traditional Owners as they map out ecological links, migratory pathways, and interspecies bonds that conserve Ningaloos biodiversity. Frolic with whales, float among seaweed islands, and see archaeologists nix a settler myth.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 - The Missing Manzi Ep3
programme.desc: Join Julz and park scout Simon Chulu as they track the Kakuli pack, who they filmed last year, and a Manzi faction whove ditched a tracking collar and broken away from the group. Spot the Kakumbi making a kill before a happy Manzi reunion ensues.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Connections Ep2
programme.desc: Follow scientists and Traditional Owners as they map out ecological links, migratory pathways, and interspecies bonds that conserve Ningaloos biodiversity. Frolic with whales, float among seaweed islands, and see archaeologists nix a settler myth.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Choices Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how Ningaloos conservation miracle could inspire humans to pull the planet back from the brink of climatic destruction. Visit an abandoned whaling station and other ruins that show we have the tools, if only we can find the will to change.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Tidelands Ep4
programme.desc: Head to Americas far north for a peek at the ultimate fighters that live along its waterways. See a spring thaw kick off the competition, pitting eagles against herons, bears against bears, and dragonfly nymphs against venomous giant water bugs.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Scrappy Ep4
programme.desc: Celebrate small but mighty animal warriors armed with sheaves of scary weapons. Admire nutrias stink bombs; honey badgers savage, needle-like choppers; black-tailed gulls razor-sharp beaks; and the killer talons on dive-bombing peregrine falcons.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 - Kakumbi Are Vulnerable Ep4
programme.desc: Encounter an elephant as Julz and Henry from the ZCP track the Kakumbi pups, who face off with a stubborn, razor-tusked warthog. Follow Thandie Mweetwa, ZCPs lion specialist, who counts the prides that are pushing the Manzi out of their territory.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1 - Tropical Shores Ep1
programme.desc: Explore the shores of the Northern Territory and the abundant waters of the Great Barrier Reef. Face flooded roads, hungry saltwater crocs, and killer jellyfish as Lizzie investigates why so many strange, deadly creatures make this remote area home.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1 - The Cool South Ep2
programme.desc: Say goodbye to the tropics and dip into cool southern-coast waters. Come face to face with majestic grey nurse sharks, shape-shifting cuttlefish, and huge blue whales; play with penguins and sea lions; and learn why these seas are brimming with life.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1 - The Wild West Ep3
programme.desc: Complete the trips final lap in the untamed lands where Australias interior desert meets the hot, hostile Indian Ocean. Confront the challenges of survival in this region as Lizzie dives with tiger sharks, manta rays, and nomadic turtles.

programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Locals call it the arribada, or arrival. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs. In Turtle Beach, new discoveries abound, as Canadian naturalist and cameraman Hugo Kitching follows a team of international scientists on a groundbreaking expedition to uncover the mysteries of this rare phenomenon.

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: Wade into a saltwater marsh along the Connecticut River to witness the heartwarming reunion of two ospreys whove been mates for a decade. Witness their highs and lows over a single summer as they raise their chicks and dodge a host of predators.

programme.title: The Ocean's Greatest Feast
programme.desc: Get a front-row seat to the planets biggest biomass migration, the annual 1,000-mile sardine run along South Africas east coast. See billions of these tiny fish run a gauntlet of hungry predators, including stealthy seals and dive-bombing gannets.

programme.title: Loons: A Cry from the Mist
programme.desc: Race the clock with biologists as they try to figure out why North American loons are suddenly in danger. Unlock the mysterious lives of these beloved birds, and ponder whether their cries will continue to be summers soundtrack or go silent forever.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Pointy Bits Ep5
programme.desc: Avoid the swords, spikes, and deadly hood ornaments on these alpha hunters. Observe elands locking corkscrew horns, storks rattling sabre-shaped beaks, rhinos scaring the competition with massive horns, and striped marlins spearing unsuspecting prey.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 - Tragedy Strikes Kakumbi Ep5
programme.desc: Feel your heart race when the Kakumbi tree a leopard whos been stalking them. Join Julz on a ZCP lion-collaring mission, go fishing with scout Simon, explore mealtime pack hierarchy, and witness a heartbreaking vigil for a badly injured Kakumbi pup.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 - Start of Trauma Season Ep1
programme.desc: Scramble as the ER team tends to a spring flood of patients. Watch vet Phil stabilize an ailing joey as the rescue team fends off a rude kangaroo. Shadow senior vet Tim, who treats a cat-scratched bandicoot and snakes a keelback out of a grate.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 - Operation Pelican Ep2
programme.desc: Head out with rescuer Jo to scoop up a pelican whos swallowed a fish hook, then see Sam free a newborn bat tangled in a fence. Follow vet Tim, who aids a surly koala with an eye infection, and watch a lumpy python give newbie Ruby a load of trouble.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 - Gutsy Koala Ep3
programme.desc: Shadow vet Bec, who patches up dog-bitten koala Rachel, and new vets Ruby and Kerryn, who soothe a pack of itchy possums. Free a pair of kookaburras trapped in a wall with rescue officer Dani and watch vet Tims squirrel glider knee surgery.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 - Brisbane Raid Ep4
programme.desc: Chase the team as they triage patients from a hoarding case, then free a tangled-up ibis with rescue officers Jo and Chantelle. Check on a baby koala that took a swan dive with vet Mel and play the waiting game with a deadly eastern brown snake.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 - Duckling Dramas Ep5
programme.desc: Deal with duelling duckling roundups and find out if vet Karina calls in specialists to treat koala Spikes leg fracture. Get to the bottom of stomach issues plaguing baby echidnas Ping and Pong, and meet koala Jarrah, who seems to have lost his way.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 - Into the Sunset Ep6
programme.desc: Contend with a flood of abandoned koala joeys, then join vet nurse Nick on a hunt for natural remedies to treat a wallabys gut ailment. Ponder options for a baby bat stuck in a tree and look on as vet Karina operates on a barn owls fractured wing.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.desc: Greece - Inspired by Thessaloniki's tasty tidbits and the marvellous mezze in Skopelos, Jamie cooks a smoky aubergine flatbread and lemony chargrilled chicken with tzatziki and crispy-bottomed rice.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Bethan and John's Railway Carriage - Simon is in Shropshire to help vintage vehicle-loving Bethan and John turn a 1940s railway goods carriage into a unique B&B located in their back garden.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep12
programme.desc: Michele and Tobin's Summerhouse - Simon and his team are in Devon to help create a unique B&B that's not just for people. After achieving their dream of buying a small holding and stables, Michele and Tobin realised that the tired summerhouse on the property could offer lodgings.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off S5 Ep12
programme.desc: The remaining junior bakers must go global - having their skills tested in tricky international challenges. The pressure is on in the technical challenge.

programme.title: Grand Designs S21 Ep8
programme.desc: Billingshurst Revisit 2023 - Every Grand Designs project has its challenges, and the triangle house in Billingshurst, West Sussex, certainly had its fair share. The build saw Olaf and Fritha Mason tackle one of the trickiest plots ever seen on the show.

programme.title: Jamie's One-Pan Wonders S1 Ep4
programme.desc: In this episode Jamie takes midweek meals up a notch, knocking out a flavour-packed, simple gnocchi supper and giant spicy meatballs full of delicious time-saving cheats, and turns a family favourite on its head with his upside-down fish pie.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Rick joins a team diving for razor clams, makes a dish of grilled shangurro clams, visits Newlyn's ordnance datum and is shown beautiful copperwork at the Penlee Museum.

programme.title: Jamie Cooks The Mediterranean S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Greece - Inspired by Thessaloniki's tasty tidbits and the marvellous mezze in Skopelos, Jamie cooks a smoky aubergine flatbread and lemony chargrilled chicken with tzatziki and crispy-bottomed rice.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off S5 Ep12
programme.desc: The remaining junior bakers must go global - having their skills tested in tricky international challenges. The pressure is on in the technical challenge.

programme.title: Grand Designs S21 Ep8
programme.desc: Billingshurst Revisit 2023 - Every Grand Designs project has its challenges, and the triangle house in Billingshurst, West Sussex, certainly had its fair share. The build saw Olaf and Fritha Mason tackle one of the trickiest plots ever seen on the show.

programme.title: Jamie Cooks The Mediterranean S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Greece - Inspired by Thessaloniki's tasty tidbits and the marvellous mezze in Skopelos, Jamie cooks a smoky aubergine flatbread and lemony chargrilled chicken with tzatziki and crispy-bottomed rice.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Stacey's Bus - In Monmouthshire in south Wales, Simon and his team are seeing double when they take on a 1980s bus conversion. Stacey, or 'Stig' to her friends, is a volunteer at the local tip recycling centre and gained her nickname due to her love of upcycling.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep14
programme.desc: Tara's Tin Shed - Simon is in Wiltshire to help primary school teacher Tara create a unique B&B from her second-hand tin shed. However, planning permissions mean that the shed must be moveable.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Kitchen Notebook: Melbourne S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Rachel wraps up her Melbourne immersion with a look into the city's current and future food trends. She meets a Thai couple that have crafted a passion for Asian fusion food with a unique all day breakfast menu.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off S9 Ep3
programme.desc: Bread Week - It's 'Bread Week'. The ten bakers have much to prove with a fruity teatime Signature; an international-flavoured Technical; and an ambitious Showstopper.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off S5 Ep13
programme.desc: The remaining junior bakers' building skills are tested in Construction Day. For the technical challenge the bakers make a cake that's intentionally the wrong way up.

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show S31 Ep5
programme.desc: Graham Norton presents a lively chat show featuring Dame Judi Dench, Arnold Schwarzenegger, Jack Whitehall, Jay Blades and Duran Duran.

programme.title: Bake Off: The Professionals S6 Ep3
programme.desc: It's chocolate week and the four remaining teams take on chocolate-domed figurines and totally-nuts desserts, before creating archaeology-themed chocolate bars.

programme.title: Airplane Repo S2 Ep2
programme.desc: The Blonde Bomber - Always one to push the limits, Mike Kennedy attempts his first helicopter heist.

programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2019
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and take a short trip back to 2019!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep16
programme.desc: Fast Franks Fixit / Tail-Kwondo - When Tag is left in charge of the Pawston Pawtomotive for the day, Frank and Beans open up a rival garage and take all the business. But when all the cars around Pawston break down because of Frank's shoddy mechanic work, Tag and Scooch have to go around town to fix all his mistakes. \ Scooch wants to be a Tail-kwondo master like his hero, Master Wag, but he can't break a biscuit with his tail. Tag helps train him (and his tail), and they even track down Master Wag who gives Scooch a good luck charm. But when Scooch loses the good luck charm before his tail-kwondo test, he needs to find a way to believe in himself.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep16
programme.desc: The Case Of The Fable Forest Gold - The Pirates are searching for the long-lost Fable Forest Gold. If they can't find it they might have to stop being pirates for good! Noddy leaps into action to help them. Using all his investigating skills, asking who, what, where, when, why and how and with the help of the wwwbook Noddy follows the clues and finds the gold! Now the pirates can stay in Toyland and hunt for treasure forever! Hurrah for Noddy!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep16
programme.desc: No Sleep Til Bedtime - It is nap time in the Jingly Jangly Jungle but Raa Raa is not tired and is determined to play hide and seek with his friends, whether they like it or not! But all this running about can be tiring work for a noisy little lion cub

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep22
programme.desc: Mumbai Dance Party - Wally, Wenda and Wizard Whitebeard visit a fellow Wizard in Mumbai to take part in a big Bollywood dance number. But when Odlulu uses the Follow-the-Leader Key to lead all the dancers away in order to dance with her, its up to the Wanderers to get the key AND the dancers back

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep22
programme.desc: Smoovin On Up / The Great Shell Robbery - Smoove Move goes from underground street artist to world-famous pedicurist and lets his newfound fame go to his head. // Thieving hermit crabs steal the crew's shells, so they concoct an elaborate heist to get them back.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep22
programme.desc: Wind - A fierce windstorm traps the gang inside the garage and they have fun together all night, but once the food runs out they team up to find a way out.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep22
programme.desc: Dang You Saved My Life / Boovsland Noir - Sharzod hates feeling indebted to Tip after being rescued and tries to get "even"; Police King Kyle must solve the case of Sharzod's missing mojo.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep43
programme.desc: Lucky and the Escape Artist - Soon-to-be-big sister Lucky borrows Snips for a day to see what its like to have a little sibling, but nothing goes as planned

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep44
programme.desc: Lucky and the Thin Ice - The frontier gets a chill when Lucky, Spirit and the PALs attempt to rescue a missing girl

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep44
programme.desc: Worms Of Endearment / Dr Strangegrug Or How I Learned To Stop Worrying And Love The Spear - Lerk and Thunk hide all the valley's worms in a cave to protect them from the hunters who want to use them as bait; Grug invents the spear and pitches it to the Valley as a tool that will change cavemanity forever!

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep45
programme.desc: Tunnel Of Terror / Creature From The Croods Lagoon - Eep, Thunk, Lerk, and Womp set out to make it to the end of The Tunnel of Terror within the Cave of Secrets; After being rescued by a mysterious creature at the watering hole, Thunk tries to convince the Valley that a sea thing exists and it's not just his imagination

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch - Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep20
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Blitzkrieg of the Bothersome Butt-erflies - As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep21
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Problematic Pandemonium of the Punishing Plungerina - After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep16
programme.desc: P.U. - Boss Baby must "de-stink" Simmons after a misfire of Stinkless Serum, and Tim & Danny try to upgrade their small- scale taxi business

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep17
programme.desc: Hush, Little Baby - When Frederic Estes tries to get babies banned from the local library, the babies fight back in a war for story time

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep18
programme.desc: Night of the Frodarg - On a dark and stormy night, Tim's fears of a local legend and Boss Baby's fear of a PuppyCo agent force the brothers to unite to stay safe as the house is infiltrated

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep13
programme.desc: One Last Job - The team plans a heist in order to obtain the enchanted pendant that can lead them to the storm wheels. Elsewhere, Klaus and Veruca shipwreck on a mysterious island that is actually home to the mages, and also the Tianshang weapon helmet.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep14
programme.desc: Doom and Groom - Po and the team have one last attempt to get the pendant, but they will have to disrupt Jayesh's wedding, and contend with his guards, to do so. At the mage island, Klaus and Veruca get hold of the Tianshang helmet.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep15
programme.desc: The Pinging - Mr. Ping is possessed by the ghost of Master Mastodon, the ancient master sworn to protect the Tianshang storm wheels. After a ghostly sewer chase, Mastodon agrees to help our team to stop Klaus and Veruca. He reveals that their next step is to go across the sea to Central America.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep48
programme.desc: Out Of The Frying Pan - When the Eruptodon can't take its egg into the Great Volcano, Hiccup and Fishlegs must go into the dangerous volcano with the egg before it's too late.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep48
programme.desc: Apple of My Ire/Funsgiving - After all their adventures, Branch no longer finds Cloud Guy as annoying as he once did. But to Cloud Guy, this is an unacceptable betrayal of their adversarial relationship. Dejected, he sets out to find a new rival to annoy./Biggie is hosting Funsgiving this year, and is therefore charged with preparing all of the best dishes for his friends. But in his quest to make things perfect, he goes a little too far

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep48
programme.desc: The Panchurian Candidate - After Uncle King Julien turned Pancho into a deadly killer so he could take back his throne, King Julien must save the kingdom before it's too late

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch - Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep21
programme.desc: Savior - When all the other students at the Academy find out Cleo is the prophesied "Savior of the Galaxy," she worries they'll treat her differently. Then she worries they won't. Then there's this freaky bug lady.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep22
programme.desc: Pirates - It turns out the Space Pirates are so cool, you guys! Cleo, Akila and Brian get captured by them, but they're so cool it's almost hard to be mad at them, you know?

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep43
programme.desc: Kral Zera - While the team struggles to come to an agreement, Haggars motives to take the throne escalate to epic proportions

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep44
programme.desc: Bloodlines - Keith is sent on a mission to destroy a weapon before Galra forces can find it

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep44
programme.desc: Gone Comic Gone / Harry Houdini - Sherman's comic goes missing and it's up to Peabody to find out who took it and why

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep45
programme.desc: P-Bro / First Canine Police Force - Peabody lets Agamemnon and his frat bros crash the show in an effort to impress them and join their fraternity.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep17
programme.desc: Almost Famoose: Chapter Four - Rocky and Bullwinkle return to Frostbite Falls to discover that because they failed to rebuild the giant birdbath, their beloved town is now completely overrun with dirty, zombie-like birds.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep18
programme.desc: The Legends of the Power Gems: Chapter One - While celebrating their friend-iversary at their favorite restaurant, Long Tom Lobsters, Rocky and Bullwinkle solve a seemingly impossible maze on the kids menu.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep43
programme.desc: Tumbleweed Wrangler / The Extreme Bean Machine - Archibald is excited to visit Roxlyn for a western-themed day together in Saddlerock. However, when Saddlerock gets overrun with tumbleweeds, they are determined not to let them spoil their perfect day. / Needing a win, Cousin Ashley enters a road race that features car innovations. With Archibalds help, Ashley will try to overcome obstacles both mental and physical, all the while driving a car that runs on baked beans.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep44
programme.desc: The Undeliverables / Johnny Hawkstorm: Two Birds, One Stone - When his special package is deemed undeliverable, Archibald teams up with Mikilos and joins an elite postal unit to get the job done. / When the main attraction at a beloved amusement park goes haywire, Johnny Hawkstorm is brought in to investigate. But Johnny is slowed down when hes assigned a rookie partner Archibald.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep22
programme.desc: Mumbai Dance Party - Wally, Wenda and Wizard Whitebeard visit a fellow Wizard in Mumbai to take part in a big Bollywood dance number. But when Odlulu uses the Follow-the-Leader Key to lead all the dancers away in order to dance with her, its up to the Wanderers to get the key AND the dancers back

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep17
programme.desc: Lucky And The Field Trip Fraud - Lucky is determined to shed her reputation as teachers pet on the class field trip.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep18
programme.desc: What Screams May Come / Grunt Anything - Eep joins the Scream-Leading team and starts picking up characteristics of her coach, Meep, much to Ugga's chagrin/Meep kicks Snoot out of the cave for not being a brave hunter. The Croods reluctantly take Snoot in and try to make him into a hunter to get him out of their home.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep17
programme.desc: Election - After hes rescued from a cave, a charismatic old lemur challenges Julien to an election for the throne.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep17
programme.desc: Hide The Lightning - Po and team go to the city of Tikal to get more information on the Protector, but it's easier said than done, since nobody in the town actually knows the identity of the Protector. Blade becomes increasingly frustrated and Po attempts to help her.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep17
programme.desc: Hush, Little Baby - When Frederic Estes tries to get babies banned from the local library, the babies fight back in a war for story time

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep17
programme.desc: Moles - Jack Sprat and Puss journey underground in search of treasure and discovery a kingdom of moles led by a rather bizarre king.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep17
programme.desc: Trolly Tales 2 / Rainbowmageddon - The Trolls try to entertain and win over Archer Pastry with a series of Troll stories/When a rainbow over Troll Village begins to experience a catastrophic breakdown, Cloud Guy arrives in the village to offer his assistance

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep17
programme.desc: Chilling Out in Antarctica - The Wanderers travel to Antarctica to witness the annual march of the penguins. Odlulu and Fritz show up looking to build an awesome fort using the Ice Castle Key. Odlulu's new ice fort separates a waddle of penguins from their eggs. The Wanderers must find a way through the ice fort to reunite the parents with their chicks.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep17
programme.desc: Racetrack - Ton-Ton's friends, The 'Dumps, visit the Flatirons but are too wild and crazy for the crew, so the Dinotrux build a racetrack perfect for joyriding.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep17
programme.desc: Mecha-Menace - Magnus and Axel unveil their new "mechano-dragon." It's impressive at first, but the Riders set out to prove it's no better than a bucket of bolts.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep17
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Runaway Bath - Pat must deliver an old bath tub to Pencaster Lighthouse. But when he goes to collect it from Thompson Ground, the bath ends up rolling away into Greendale with Jess inside! When Pat catches up with the bath he finds PC Selby about to impound it for being an un-road-worthy vehicle. Pat explains it's a Special Delivery and at last gets on his way. But when he arrives in Pencaster Bay, Micawber and Jess between them manage to loosen the rope tying up the SDS Boat and it goes chugging off to sea with no one on board! So Pat and Jess use the bath as a boat and paddle out to rescue the boat then at last deliver the old bath to Chris. SDS Mission accomplished - mioaw!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep17
programme.desc: Why Crocodile Has A Bumpy Back - You see there was a time when Crocodile didn't have a bumpy back. His skin was all smooth and he had to be very careful of the hot Tinga Tinga sun. One day whilst napping Crocodile gets very sunburnt and falls into a deep sleep. Lion warns all the animals to be on their guard as the Wildebeest have returned to Tinga Tinga and they could stampede at any moment. Crocodile misses the meeting, snoring under the hot sun. The animals try to warn snappy Crocodile but it's too late and the Wildebeest stampede! OOOoof! . All over Crocodile. From that day on Crocodile has a bumpy back and is grumpier and snappier than ever! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep69
programme.desc: Dr Webby - Bumble's sneezing has got so bad, it is keeping everyone awake at night. Webby gives Fifi a recipe for a cure for sneezes will it work?

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep17
programme.desc: Rupert and the Giant Sunflower - Rupert is very excited. Mother Nature has given him a special elixir to help his sunflower seeds grow but there's a big surprise to come.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep17
programme.desc: Harmony Harbor's Holiday Surprise - When the townsfolk decorate the Harmony Harbor holiday tree but lose the treetop star, TZG secretly search for it in the yard of a notoriously scary house. / When it transpires the house is not-so-scary after all and belongs to shy inventor Dr. Greenlittle, TZG secretly leads her to the big Harmony Harbor sing-along so that she doesn't have to spend the holiday alone.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep17
programme.desc: Happy Birthday Pawston - Tag and Scooch embark on a road trip to Chew York City to track down Kelly Korgi to ask her to perform at Pawstons 100th birthday party.\ When Kelly Korgi tells Tag she cant perform at Pawstons 100th birthday party, she and Scooch decide to create a Kelly Korgi replacement so that she doesnt break her promise to the town.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep17
programme.desc: The Case Of The Unhelpful Queen - One of the Knights has tried a magic spell but it went wrong and he's shrunk! Queen Sparklewings could help him but she's hiding and won't come out. It's up to Noddy to investigate and work out why the Queen is hiding and how to persuade her to help the Knight grow again. With the help of his wwwbook Noddy discovers that the Queen has got felt pen on her face and is too shy to be seen! Once Noddy shows her how to remove the felt pen the Queen stops hiding and the Knight can return to the right size. Thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep17
programme.desc: Raa Raa's Rainy Day - It is raining in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. Raa Raa is annoyed as he doesn't think he'll be able to play with his friends until they discover that the rain makes lots of exciting new noises.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep23
programme.desc: Riddle Me This, Egypt - Wally and Wenda accompany Wizard Dustybeard on his latest archaeology expedition: finding the Lost Chamber of Magic Keys. To find the hidden chamber, the Wanderers will have to solve the key's riddles. But Odlulu is on their tail, and when she takes the Riddle Key, the Wanderers must navigate a hidden pyramid full of tricks and traps.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep23
programme.desc: Chet Vs Dr. Disorder / Damselfly In Distress - Chet becomes obsessed with tracking down a litterbug who is messing up the clean streets of Turbotown. // The FAST crew must compete against each other as they run a dangerous obstacle course race to save a damselfly princess who is being held captive.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep23
programme.desc: Lightning - When Skrap-It gets struck by lightning, he's suddenly smart and comes up with a plan for D-Structs to remove the Dinotrux from the crater for good.on truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep23
programme.desc: Nuttypunny / Jealohsy - When Tip can't win at the Boov game of Nuttypunny, her identity is challenged; Oh tries to win back Krunkle's affection with misguided help from Tip.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep45
programme.desc: Lucky and the Ray of Sunshine - The PALs agree to work on Grayson's ranch to get out of trouble, but he gets more help than he bargained for

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep46
programme.desc: Lucky and the Double-Dad Dare - Jim and Al set up a survival course for Lucky, Pru and Abigail, but when things go awry, the dads are the ones who need saving

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep46
programme.desc: Voice Fail Part 1 & 2 - When Grug wakes up without a voice, he and Ugga go on the hunt to find his voice, while Eep, Thunk, and Gran stay behind. But when the Valleyites come to Eep with questions for Grug, she takes this opportunity to be a leader by pretending to have a conversation with Grug in their cave

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep47
programme.desc: Punch Thunk Love / Nay Boors - When Eep and the others try to intervene with Thunk and Blurg's first date, they decide to run away so they can live happily ever after; Snoot and Ugga race each other to get to the Doomsday Skunkguin but are forced to put their differences aside once the weirder animals come out to hunt them down

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep22
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bombastic Blathering of Brainy Blabulous - When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep23
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Crazy Caustic Spray of the Contagious Cruelius Sneezer - In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Trashy Tale of the Tumultuous Tubbadump - In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep19
programme.desc: Fugitive's Day Out - Boss Baby is framed for leaking info about the Stinkless Serum to PuppyCo and must flee on the run via Errand Day with the family

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep20
programme.desc: El Apasionado Negocio de la Niera - Frederic makes a play to take over the town's babysitters by instituting "senior sitting"

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep21
programme.desc: Plushythingy - When Frederic Estes creates the cutest plushy ever that is the hottest toy in town, the field team must destroy the last remaining one but are powerless against its cuteness

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep16
programme.desc: Mister Mastodon - Po and team arrive in Guatemala and meet farmers who are facing a mysterious threat-- named The Protector, wielding the Storm Wheels. Elsewhere, Colin the Stag Knight and Weimin team up to go after Po and discover Mr. Ping's connection to the widely feared Pirate Queen.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep17
programme.desc: Hide The Lightning - Po and team go to the city of Tikal to get more information on the Protector, but it's easier said than done, since nobody in the town actually knows the identity of the Protector. Blade becomes increasingly frustrated and Po attempts to help her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep18
programme.desc: The Beast - Po and team play a game of Pok-ta-pok against a family of armadillos for the opportunity to talk one on one with Zuma, the leader. The game brings out a highly competitive and aggressive side to Blade, known as "The Beast." Back in China, Colin and Weimin find the Pirate Queen and become part of her pirate crew.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep49
programme.desc: Twintuition - When the Twins journey to the Northern Markets to fix their prized mace, they end up stumbling onto a secret project by Viggo and the Dragon Hunters.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep49
programme.desc: Bunker Break-In/To Catch a Critter - When Branch loses to Poppy at Capture the Flag, he challenges her to break into his bunker and steal Gary, to prove her abilities. Poppy organizes a whacky heist with the help of the Snack Pack. /When Smidge accidentally loses some of the critters Milton cares for, she must try and retrieve them from Trolls Forest.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep49

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep24
programme.desc: Eyeball - Brian and Akila get trapped inside this weird planet and Brian reprograms a broken Xerx robot and basically, it's like it's their baby. They have to raise it real fast so it can save them from fire monsters and junk.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep211
programme.desc: The Boat Pond - Peppa and her family and friends are playing at the pond with their toy boats. Everyone has a boat to play with except Rebecca Rabbit. Daddy Pig makes Rebecca a boat out of newspaper. Rebeccas paper boat is so nice; everyone wants one.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Mr Scarecrow - The birds keep eating the seeds from Grandpa Pig's flower garden. Peppa and George make a scarecrow, which stops the birds from eating. But Peppa is worried that the birds are hungry, so Granny Pig gives the birdies a birdfeeder with their own seeds.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep213
programme.desc: The Time Capsule - Peppa and her school friends are making a time capsule. They each put one of their favourite things inside and bury it in the school garden. The children discover that their parents made a time capsule many years ago.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep169
programme.desc: The Key - Because of her fear of spiders, Froga locks herself and Ron in the greenhouse to collecting Strawberries for the friends' Strawberry Snack time Musical Feast. But when it is time to leave, she can't locate the key...

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep170
programme.desc: Fruits Surprise - When Froga and Christopher realize that Anna and Bubu may be making a "fruit surprises" for Snack Time, they try everything they can to preserve the two surprises. Froga and Christopher realized how difficult preserving a surprise can be!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Apple Pie / Guacamole - Tiny Chef bakes apple pie for the big contest, and after an accident, has to think fast to come up with a new entry. // Tiny Chef makes guacamole and has to learn to share when his friends want to help using a new kitchen tool.

programme.desc: Pups Save a Robosaurus / Pups Save a Film Festival - When a homemade Robotic Dino named Earl comes to life, the pups need to find him, stop him, and bring him home. // The pups are shooting their Film Festival entry until Daring Danny X cuts the action with his dangerous stunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Recycling - Peppa and George help Mummy Pig tidy up the breakfast things. Mummy Pig tells them that bottles go into a special green box to be recycled. Old newspapers go in a red box and tins go in a blue box. Peppa and George have fun filling the boxes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Daddy Pig's Office - Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pigs office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbits job is all about numbers, Mrs Cats job is all about drawing shapes on the computer, and Daddy Pigs job is complicated.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Pirate Island - Grandpa and Granny Pig are taking Peppa, George and their friends to Pirate Island. Grandpa shows how to use his metal detector to find treasures and they all build a big sandcastle.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Jumble Sale - Peppas playgroup is holding a jumble sale to raise money for a new roof and Madame Gazelle asks everyone to bring something to sell. Peppa and her friends bring in an old toy but they soon realise that favourite toys can be hard to let go of.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Swimming - Peppa and her family are at the swimming pool. Rebecca Rabbit is there too. She and Peppa are very proud of their swimming skills. Everyone is surprised to discover that Daddy Pig is very good at swimming and diving. Very good indeed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Foggy Day - Mummy and Daddy Pig are taking Peppa and George to play in the playground. On the way it gets a bit foggy, and soon it is so foggy they cant see. They decide to go home. But which way is home?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep304
programme.desc: The Library - Daddy Pig has a book from the library that he has kept for too long. The family go to the library to return it and find more books to read.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep210
programme.desc: George's Friend - George and Rebecca Rabbit's little brother Richard each have a toy dinosaur but they are not very good at sharing their toys. Mummy Pig shows them that they can have much more fun at the playground if they play together, just like their big sisters.

programme.desc: Snowball Bonanza / The Present - Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighboring town. // Baby Shark goes undercover to figure out the perfect gift for Mommy Shark.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep229
programme.desc: Painting - Peppa and George are painting. Daddy shows them how to mix paints and the three of them paint a beautiful picture of a cherry tree. Everything is going very well, until the ducks turn up and decide to run through the paint and all over the painting.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep230
programme.desc: Cuckoo Clock - Daddy Pig winds up the old cuckoo clock. When a wooden cuckoo pops out singing Cuckoo!, Peppa thinks it is very funny, but George has missed the whole thing. George does not want to miss the cuckoo again but the cuckoo only pops out once an hour.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep231
programme.desc: The Cycle Ride - Peppa and her family are going for a days cycle ride. Peppa loves cycling downhill but shes not so keen on peddling uphill. So, when the family meet all of Peppas friends and decide to have a race, Peppa insists it should be a down hill race.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep232
programme.desc: Ice Skating - Peppa and George are going ice-skating for the first time. Mummy Pig teaches Peppa to skate and soon she is having lots of fun. Peppa begins to teach George how to skate but it turns out he is a natural born skater. Peppa and George love ice-skating.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep233
programme.desc: Dentist - Peppa and George are at the dentist. Dr Elephant says that Peppa and Georges teeth are lovely and clean. But Georges plastic toy Mr Dinosaur teeth are a bit yellow. Dr Elephant polishes Mr Dinosaurs teeth until they are bright and shiny.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep234
programme.desc: Dens - Peppa is playing in the tree-house with the girls, and George and the boys stay in the castle that Grandpa Pig built for them. But when it starts to rain and the garden is covered in muddy puddles, they rush out to play together!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Pedro's Cough - Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Doctor Brown Bear gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Emily Elephant - There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.desc: Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen - Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake. // Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Clock and Dance / Barbapileup - The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep701
programme.desc: Sparkle's Big Rescue - When Crusher sends Blaze away with one of his latest cheats, Blaze's little sister Sparkle comes to save the day and bring her brother back in time so they can race together to win the Teamwork Trophy!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep702
programme.desc: Mail Truck Blaze - When three big mail deliveries are needed around the world, there's only one monster machine who can deliver it all: Mail Truck Blaze! He'll swim across seas, climb mountains, and venture to the Monster Dome --because mail trucks ALWAYS deliver!

programme.desc: Medievel Tides - When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.
